root.name: Up
root.description: OverviewUp is a youth-oriented, 3D co-op platformer and mini game collection based on the film of the same name. It was released under the Play THQ banner, normally used for THQ's family-friendly software.ReceptionVery few professional outlets have reviewed Up for Playstation 2. Notably, IGN awarded it a 5.8 "Mediocre" in theirreview, stating:"If you enjoyed Pixarâ€™s brilliant film, Up the game is disappointing on PlayStation 2. It will keep the good times rolling for the younger audience for a few hours at the most but the experience has some complications that will stump younger children. The ease of jumping in and out of cooperative play is appreciated but the majority of the game is woefully far from fun."
